statements: DELETE FROM material_sourcing WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers' AND sourcing_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM material_sourcing WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers' AND sourcing_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM materials WHERE material_id = 100 AND supplier_id = 1;

DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'Project%' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
